titles.title: Estate Tax Repeal Acceleration (ExTRA) for Family-Owned Businesses and Farms Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the immediate and permanent repeal of the estate tax on family-owned businesses and farms, and for other purposes.
Estate Tax Repeal Acceleration (ExTRA) for Family-Owned Businesses and Farms Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Estate Tax Repeal Acceleration (ExTRA) for Family-Owned Businesses and Farms Act - Amends estate tax provisions of the Internal Revenue Code to repeal section 2057 (Family-Owned Business Interests). Allows for purposes of such tax, in the case of an electing estate of a decedent with specified carryover business interests, the taxable estate value to be determined by deducting from the value of the gross estate the adjusted value of such carryover business interests of the decedent. Provides for the treatment of carryover business interests and spousal property.
